pbcCmtsMib.name: pbcCmtsMib
pbcCmtsMib.description: This module defines all management objects which are common to PBC CMTS products.

TenthdBmV.name: TenthdBmV
TenthdBmV.description: This data type represents power levels that are normally expressed in dBmV. Units are in tenths of a dBmV; for example, 5.1 dBmV will be represented as 51.

TenthdB.name: TenthdB
TenthdB.description: his data type represents relationships which are normally expressed in decibels (dB). Units are in tenths of a dB; for example, 15.3 dB will be represented as 153.

OneHundredthdBmVPerHz.name: OneHundredthdBmVPerHz
OneHundredthdBmVPerHz.description: his data type represents power levels that are normally expressed in dBmV/Hz. Units are in hundredths of a dBmV/Hz; for example, 15.3 dBmV/Hz will be represented as 1530.

pbcCmtsIfDownstreamNumEntries.name: pbcCmtsIfDownstreamNumEntries
pbcCmtsIfDownstreamNumEntries.description: Number of downstream channels represented in the downstream channel table.

pbcCmtsIfDownstreamChannelTable.name: pbcCmtsIfDownstreamChannelTable
pbcCmtsIfDownstreamChannelTable.description: PBC-specific management objects associated with downstream channels.

pbcCmtsIfDownstreamChannelEntry.name: pbcCmtsIfDownstreamChannelEntry
pbcCmtsIfDownstreamChannelEntry.description: PBC-specific management objects associated with one downstream channel.

pbcCmtsIfDownstreamIfTxPower.name: pbcCmtsIfDownstreamIfTxPower
pbcCmtsIfDownstreamIfTxPower.description: Intermediate Frequency (IF) signal power being supplied to the upconverter on this channel.

pbcCmtsIfUpstreamNumEntries.name: pbcCmtsIfUpstreamNumEntries
pbcCmtsIfUpstreamNumEntries.description: Number of upstream channels in the upstream channel table.

pbcCmtsIfUpstreamChannelTable.name: pbcCmtsIfUpstreamChannelTable
pbcCmtsIfUpstreamChannelTable.description: PBC-specific management objects associated with upstream channels.

pbcCmtsIfUpstreamChannelEntry.name: pbcCmtsIfUpstreamChannelEntry
pbcCmtsIfUpstreamChannelEntry.description: PBC extended US management objects for one US channel.

pbcCmtsIfUpstreamPort.name: pbcCmtsIfUpstreamPort
pbcCmtsIfUpstreamPort.description: Associates the upstream channel with one of the physical upstream cable connectors. A value of -1 indicates that the channel currently is not associated with any port.

pbcCmtsIfUpstreamOperMode.name: pbcCmtsIfUpstreamOperMode
pbcCmtsIfUpstreamOperMode.description: Controls the usage of this channel as follows: 1 = available (for use) 2 = standby (for redundancy purposes) 3 = inUse (channel is configured for data) 4 = scanning (doing dedicated spectral analysis) 5 = unlicensed (a 'key' is required to access the channel)

pbcCmtsIfUpstreamPowerLevel.name: pbcCmtsIfUpstreamPowerLevel
pbcCmtsIfUpstreamPowerLevel.description: Upstream's sample-based measured received signal power.

pbcCmtsIfUpstreamMER.name: pbcCmtsIfUpstreamMER
pbcCmtsIfUpstreamMER.description: Upstream channel's modulation error ratio expressed in dB.

pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCrcErrors.name: pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCrcErrors
pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCrcErrors.description: CRC errors detected on this channel.

pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCER.name: pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCER
pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCER.description: Percentage of codewords that had unrecoverable errors.

pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmTotal.name: pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmTotal
pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmTotal.description: Total Number of CMs in this Upstream Channel.

pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmRangeAborted.name: pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmRangeAborted
pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmRangeAborted.description: Total Number of CMs with Range Abort Status in this Upstream Channel.

pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmRanging.name: pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmRanging
pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmRanging.description: Total Number of Ranging CMs in this Upstream Channel.

pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmRangingComplete.name: pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmRangingComplete
pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmRangingComplete.description: Total Number of CMs with Ranging Complete Status in this Upstream Channel.

pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmIpComplete.name: pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmIpComplete
pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmIpComplete.description: Total Number of CMs with IP Complete Status in this Upstream Channel.

pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmRegistered.name: pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmRegistered
pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmRegistered.description: Total Number of Registered CMs in this Upstream Channel.

pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmRogue.name: pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmRogue
pbcCmtsIfUpstreamCmRogue.description: Total Number of Rogue CMs in this Upstream Channel.

pbcCmtsIfMacCmTotal.name: pbcCmtsIfMacCmTotal
pbcCmtsIfMacCmTotal.description: Number of CMs in this MAC domain.

pbcCmtsIfMacCmRangeAborted.name: pbcCmtsIfMacCmRangeAborted
pbcCmtsIfMacCmRangeAborted.description: Number of CMs with Ranging aborted status in this MAC domain.

pbcCmtsIfMacCmRanging.name: pbcCmtsIfMacCmRanging
pbcCmtsIfMacCmRanging.description: Number of CMs with Ranging status in this MAC domain.

pbcCmtsIfMacCmRangingComplete.name: pbcCmtsIfMacCmRangingComplete
pbcCmtsIfMacCmRangingComplete.description: Number of Ranging completed CMs in this MAC domain.

pbcCmtsIfMacCmIpComplete.name: pbcCmtsIfMacCmIpComplete
pbcCmtsIfMacCmIpComplete.description: Number of CMs with IP Complete status in this MAC domain.

pbcCmtsIfMacCmRegistered.name: pbcCmtsIfMacCmRegistered
pbcCmtsIfMacCmRegistered.description: Number of Registered CMs in this MAC domain.

pbcCmtsIfMacCmRogue.name: pbcCmtsIfMacCmRogue
pbcCmtsIfMacCmRogue.description: Number of Rogue CMs in this MAC domain.

pbcCmtsCmStatusFirstOnline.name: pbcCmtsCmStatusFirstOnline
pbcCmtsCmStatusFirstOnline.description: Date and Time when CM was seen by the system for the first time.

pbcCmtsCmStatusLastOnline.name: pbcCmtsCmStatusLastOnline
pbcCmtsCmStatusLastOnline.description: Date and Time when the CM came online recently.

pbcCmtsCmStatusTimesOnline.name: pbcCmtsCmStatusTimesOnline
pbcCmtsCmStatusTimesOnline.description: Number of times the CM came online.

pbcCmtsCmStatusPercentOnline.name: pbcCmtsCmStatusPercentOnline
pbcCmtsCmStatusPercentOnline.description: Percent of time for the CM has been online.

pbcCmtsCmStatusMinOnline.name: pbcCmtsCmStatusMinOnline
pbcCmtsCmStatusMinOnline.description: Minimum time interval the CM was online.

pbcCmtsCmStatusMaxOnline.name: pbcCmtsCmStatusMaxOnline
pbcCmtsCmStatusMaxOnline.description: Maximum time interval the CM was online.

pbcCmtsCmStatusAvgOnline.name: pbcCmtsCmStatusAvgOnline
pbcCmtsCmStatusAvgOnline.description: Average time interval the CM was online.

pbcCmtsCmStatusMinOffline.name: pbcCmtsCmStatusMinOffline
pbcCmtsCmStatusMinOffline.description: Minimum time interval the CM was offline.

pbcCmtsCmStatusMaxOffline.name: pbcCmtsCmStatusMaxOffline
pbcCmtsCmStatusMaxOffline.description: Maximum time interval the CM was offline.

pbcCmtsCmStatusAvgOffline.name: pbcCmtsCmStatusAvgOffline
pbcCmtsCmStatusAvgOffline.description: Average time interval the CM was offline.

pbcCmtsRogueCmTable.name: pbcCmtsRogueCmTable
pbcCmtsRogueCmTable.description: Contain information associated with all the Rogue Cable Modems detected by the CMTS.

pbcCmtsRogueCmEntry.name: pbcCmtsRogueCmEntry
pbcCmtsRogueCmEntry.description: An entry would be created for every rogue Cable Modem detected by CMTS.

pbcCmtsRogueCmMacAddress.name: pbcCmtsRogueCmMacAddress
pbcCmtsRogueCmMacAddress.description: MAC Address of the Rogue CM.

pbcCmtsRogueCmIpAddress.name: pbcCmtsRogueCmIpAddress
pbcCmtsRogueCmIpAddress.description: IP Address of the Rogue CM.

pbcCmtsRogueCmPtr.name: pbcCmtsRogueCmPtr
pbcCmtsRogueCmPtr.description: An row index into docsIfCmtsCmStatusTable. When queried with the correct instance value (e.g. a CM's MAC address), returns the index in docsIfCmtsCmStatusTable which represents that CM.

pbcCmtsRogueCmType.name: pbcCmtsRogueCmType
pbcCmtsRogueCmType.description: Type of the Rogue CM. Valid Values are unProvisioned (1), rigged (2), configured (3).

pbcCmtsRogueCmFirstActive.name: pbcCmtsRogueCmFirstActive
pbcCmtsRogueCmFirstActive.description: Date and Time when CM was seen by the system for the first time.

pbcCmtsRogueCmLastActive.name: pbcCmtsRogueCmLastActive
pbcCmtsRogueCmLastActive.description: Date and Time when the last time an IM was seen from this CM. The LastActive tells the latest time when CM was detected as rogue and put to rest.

pbcSpectrumAnalysisRFInputTable.name: pbcSpectrumAnalysisRFInputTable
pbcSpectrumAnalysisRFInputTable.description: There is an entry in this table for each upstream input connector on each DOCSIS module in the CMTS. Each port is uniquely identified within the CMTS by its pbcCardIfPortIndex value. This index object is defined under the generic chassis management section of the PBC private MIB tree.

pbcSpectrumAnalysisRFInputEntry.name: pbcSpectrumAnalysisRFInputEntry
pbcSpectrumAnalysisRFInputEntry.description: An entry in the RF monitoring input (port) table.

pbcSpectrumAnalysisEnable.name: pbcSpectrumAnalysisEnable
pbcSpectrumAnalysisEnable.description: True ('1') enables spectrum estimation. This should be set only after setting the other parameters affecting the scan. After setting this 'true', pbcSpectrumAnalysisCmdStatus will reflect initial and, ultimately, final status of the sweep attempt.

pbcSpectrumAnalysisIntegrationLen.name: pbcSpectrumAnalysisIntegrationLen
pbcSpectrumAnalysisIntegrationLen.description: This specifies the number of estimates over which the peak of the noise power is calculated.

pbcSpectrumAnalysisFreqStep.name: pbcSpectrumAnalysisFreqStep
pbcSpectrumAnalysisFreqStep.description: The frequency step for scanning which defines the frequency resolution. The choices are: 20KHz, 40KHz, 80KHz and 160KHz.

pbcSpectrumAnalysisFreqMin.name: pbcSpectrumAnalysisFreqMin
pbcSpectrumAnalysisFreqMin.description: The low end of the frequency range being scanned. The lowest legal value, per both the DOCSIS and Euro-DOCSIS standards, is 5MHz.

pbcSpectrumAnalysisFreqMax.name: pbcSpectrumAnalysisFreqMax
pbcSpectrumAnalysisFreqMax.description: Top end of the frequency range being scanned. For DOCSIS, the maximum is 42MHz and for Euro-DOCSIS it is 65MHz.

pbcSpectrumAnalysisArraySize.name: pbcSpectrumAnalysisArraySize
pbcSpectrumAnalysisArraySize.description: This variable holds/specifies the number of scan data tables to be allocated to this particular scan instance. The size of each table and, therefore, the total amount of buffer space required is determined by the other scan parameters. If the agent is unable to allocate that amount of space, a status of 'noResources' will be returned in pbcSpectrumAnalysisCmdStatus following the setting of pbcSpectrumAnalysisEnable. If successful, this becomes the total number of table entries in pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayIndexTable. A size of '2' is the absolute minimum to permit the agent to fill one table with data points while the management application is 'draining' the other.

pbcSpectrumAnalysisActiveArray.name: pbcSpectrumAnalysisActiveArray
pbcSpectrumAnalysisActiveArray.description: Contains the pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayIndex number of the data table currently being filled with spectral data points.

pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayIndexTable.name: pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayIndexTable
pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayIndexTable.description: The table serves as an index, with status, into the pbcSpectrumAnalysisDataTable, thus uniquely identifying all of the data points which constitute one spectral sweep.

pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayIndex.name: pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayIndex
pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayIndex.description: Index number of this data table.

pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayStatus.name: pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayStatus
pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayStatus.description: The operational status of this data table. The management application which is reading the spectrum monitoring data should, after reading all the data entries associated with this array (table),set this variable back to 'available'.

pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayScanStart.name: pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayScanStart
pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayScanStart.description: The date and time when this table's spectral sweep began.

pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayScanStop.name: pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayScanStop
pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayScanStop.description: The date and time when this table's spectral sweep was completed or stopped for some other reason.

pbcSpectrumAnalysisDataTable.name: pbcSpectrumAnalysisDataTable
pbcSpectrumAnalysisDataTable.description: The Frequency-Power tuples are stored in this table. The maximum number of elements is determined by the size of the frequency step and the RF range to be scanned and can therefore not exceed 1850.

pbcSpectrumAnalysisDataEntry.name: pbcSpectrumAnalysisDataEntry
pbcSpectrumAnalysisDataEntry.description: An entry in the spectrum analysis data table.

pbcSpectrumAnalysisPower.name: pbcSpectrumAnalysisPower
pbcSpectrumAnalysisPower.description: Measured power in hundredths of a dBmV/Hz.

pbcCmtsSpectrumAnalysisNotificationTable.name: pbcCmtsSpectrumAnalysisNotificationTable
pbcCmtsSpectrumAnalysisNotificationTable.description: Allows specific 'sweep complete' trap recipients to be specified on a per-port basis.

pbcCmtsSpectrumAnalysisNotificationEntry.name: pbcCmtsSpectrumAnalysisNotificationEntry
pbcCmtsSpectrumAnalysisNotificationEntry.description: Contains the IP address of the desired trap recipient of 'sweep complete' notifications generated by active spectral monitoring on a specific US port.

pbcCmtsSpectrumAnalysisEnableSweepNotifi.name: pbcCmtsSpectrumAnalysisEnableSweepNotification
pbcCmtsSpectrumAnalysisEnableSweepNotifi.description: True ('1') enables 'sweep complete' notifications so that the receiver knows it may/should retrieve the current spectral data points.

pbcSweepNotificationRecipient.name: pbcSweepNotificationRecipient
pbcSweepNotificationRecipient.description: The IP address of the management station wishing to receive the 'sweep complete' notifications from this system for this monitored port.

pbcSweepNotificationRecipientPort.name: pbcSweepNotificationRecipientPort
pbcSweepNotificationRecipientPort.description: Port that recipient is listening on for notifications.

pbcCmtsSpectrumAnalysisNotificationType.name: pbcCmtsSpectrumAnalysisNotificationType
pbcCmtsSpectrumAnalysisNotificationType.description: Selects between SNMPv2c and SNMPv3 traps.

pbcCardIfPortIndexID.name: pbcCardIfPortIndexID
pbcCardIfPortIndexID.description: Instance of the pbcCardIfPortIndex to be bound with the Trap/Notify PDU.

pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayIndexID.name: pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayIndexID
pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayIndexID.description: Instance of the pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayIndex to be bound with the Trap/Notify PDU.

pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayStatusID.name: pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayStatusID
pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayStatusID.description: Instance of the pbcSpectrumAnalysisArrayStatus to be bound with the Trap/Notify PDU.

pbcCmtsSpectrumAnalysisSweepComplete.name: pbcCmtsSpectrumAnalysisSweepComplete
pbcCmtsSpectrumAnalysisSweepComplete.description: Denotes the conclusion, with status and data table identification, of an RF sweep operation.

pbcCmtsEventsEnable.name: pbcCmtsEventsEnable
pbcCmtsEventsEnable.description: Enables or disables vendor specific event generation.

pbcCmtsNotificationsControl.name: pbcCmtsNotificationsControl
pbcCmtsNotificationsControl.description: A '1' in a given bit position enables that class of notifications.

pbcCmtsSoftwareNotification.name: pbcCmtsSoftwareNotification
pbcCmtsSoftwareNotification.description: Notifications from the software management system.

pbcCmtsDebugNotification.name: pbcCmtsDebugNotification
pbcCmtsDebugNotification.description: Notifications generated for internal debugging. This can be enabled by setting debug class of CMTS notifications.

pbcCmtsCmStateChangeNotification.name: pbcCmtsCmStateChangeNotification
pbcCmtsCmStateChangeNotification.description: Notifications generated to track MODEM state. This event can be enabled by setting cmStateChange bit of the CMTS Notification Control.

pbcCmtsModemEventsEnable.name: pbcCmtsModemEventsEnable
pbcCmtsModemEventsEnable.description: Enables or disables Modem De-Ranging and Registration event Generation.

pbcCableSpectrumManagementGroup.name: pbcCableSpectrumManagementGroup
pbcCableSpectrumManagementGroup.description: Group of objects implemented in Cable Modem Termination Systems providing Flap List information.

pbcCmtsNotificationManagementGroup.name: pbcCmtsNotificationManagementGroup
pbcCmtsNotificationManagementGroup.description: Group of objects associated with vendor-specific notification control.

pbcCmtsBasicCompliance.name: pbcCmtsBasicCompliance
pbcCmtsBasicCompliance.description: Object groups which must be supported.

pbcCmtsFlapListAgeMinutes.name: pbcCmtsFlapListAgeMinutes
pbcCmtsFlapListAgeMinutes.description: Aging time in minutes (From 1 minute to 60 days).

pbcCmtsFlapListIMRetryInterval.name: pbcCmtsFlapListIMRetryInterval
pbcCmtsFlapListIMRetryInterval.description: Duration between two consecutive IM Retries that is considered a flap event in seconds.

pbcCmtsFlapListQPSKSNRThreshold.name: pbcCmtsFlapListQPSKSNRThreshold
pbcCmtsFlapListQPSKSNRThreshold.description: QPSK SNR Threshold (in tenth of dB).

pbcCmtsFlapListQAM16SNRThreshold.name: pbcCmtsFlapListQAM16SNRThreshold
pbcCmtsFlapListQAM16SNRThreshold.description: QAM16 SNR Threshold (in tenth of dB).

pbcCmtsFlapListPowerAdjustThreshold.name: pbcCmtsFlapListPowerAdjustThreshold
pbcCmtsFlapListPowerAdjustThreshold.description: Power Adjust Threshold (in tenth of a dB).

pbcCmtsFlapListFreqThreshold.name: pbcCmtsFlapListFreqThreshold
pbcCmtsFlapListFreqThreshold.description: Upstream Frequency drift Threshold (in Hertz). A non zero value of pbcCmtsUsFlapListFreqThreshold overrides this value for an upstream channel.

pbcCmtsFlapListSize.name: pbcCmtsFlapListSize
pbcCmtsFlapListSize.description: Maximum number of entries in the Flap List Table.

pbcUsFlapListControlTable.name: pbcUsFlapListControlTable
pbcUsFlapListControlTable.description: Various flap thresholds to be applied per upstream channel.

pbcUsFlapListControlEntry.name: pbcUsFlapListControlEntry
pbcUsFlapListControlEntry.description: An entry for every upstream channel in the system.

pbcUsFlapListControlIMRetryInterval.name: pbcUsFlapListControlIMRetryInterval
pbcUsFlapListControlIMRetryInterval.description: Duration in seconds between two consecutive IM Retries that is considered a flap event. A non zero value overrides the global pbcCmtsFlapListIMRetryInterval for this upstream channel.

pbcUsFlapListControlCERThreshold.name: pbcUsFlapListControlCERThreshold
pbcUsFlapListControlCERThreshold.description: CER Threshold (in millionth, normalized 0 to 1). A non zero value overrides the global pbcCmtsFlapListCERThreshold for this upstream channel.

pbcUsFlapListControlMERThreshold.name: pbcUsFlapListControlMERThreshold
pbcUsFlapListControlMERThreshold.description: MER Threshold (in Tenth of a dB). A non zero value overrides the global pbcCmtsFlapListMERThreshold for this upstream channel.

pbcUsFlapListControlQPSKSNRThreshold.name: pbcUsFlapListControlQPSKSNRThreshold
pbcUsFlapListControlQPSKSNRThreshold.description: QPSK SNR Threshold (in tenth of dB). A non zero value overrides the global pbcCmtsFlapListQPSKSNRThreshold for this upstream channel.

pbcUsFlapListControlQAM16SNRThreshold.name: pbcUsFlapListControlQAM16SNRThreshold
pbcUsFlapListControlQAM16SNRThreshold.description: QAM16 SNR Threshold (in tenth of dB). A non zero value overrides the global pbcCmtsFlapListQPSKSNRThreshold for this upstream channel.

pbcUsFlapListControlPowerAdjustThreshold.name: pbcUsFlapListControlPowerAdjustThreshold
pbcUsFlapListControlPowerAdjustThreshold.description: Power Adjust Threshold (in dB). A non zero value overrides the global pbcCmtsFlapListPowerAdjustThreshold for this upstream channel.

pbcUsFlapListControlSMMissThreshold.name: pbcUsFlapListControlSMMissThreshold
pbcUsFlapListControlSMMissThreshold.description: SM Miss Quantity Threshold. A non zero value overrides the global pbcCmtsFlapListSMMissThreshold for this upstream channel.

pbcUsFlapListControlFreqThreshold.name: pbcUsFlapListControlFreqThreshold
pbcUsFlapListControlFreqThreshold.description: Upstream Frequency drift Threshold (in Hertz). A non zero value overrides the global pbcCmtsFlapListFreqThreshold for this upstream channel.

pbcCmtsFlapListTable.name: pbcCmtsFlapListTable
pbcCmtsFlapListTable.description: information about the recently flapping cable modems according to the various thresholds set in the pbcCmtsFlapListObjects.

pbcCmtsFlapListEntry.name: pbcCmtsFlapListEntry
pbcCmtsFlapListEntry.description: An entry for every Flapping modem in the system.

pbcCmtsFlapListMacAddr.name: pbcCmtsFlapListMacAddr
pbcCmtsFlapListMacAddr.description: MAC address of the Flapping modem.

pbcCmtsFlapListUpstreamIfIndex.name: pbcCmtsFlapListUpstreamIfIndex
pbcCmtsFlapListUpstreamIfIndex.description: Upstream Interface Index of the Flapping modem.

pbcCmtsFlapListDownstreamIfIndex.name: pbcCmtsFlapListDownstreamIfIndex
pbcCmtsFlapListDownstreamIfIndex.description: Downstream Interface Index of the Flapping modem.

pbcCmtsFlapListFlapCount.name: pbcCmtsFlapListFlapCount
pbcCmtsFlapListFlapCount.description: Number of times the modem has Flapped.

pbcCmtsFlapListFlapCause.name: pbcCmtsFlapListFlapCause
pbcCmtsFlapListFlapCause.description: Last flap cause for the modem.

pbcCmtsFlapListFreqDrift.name: pbcCmtsFlapListFreqDrift
pbcCmtsFlapListFreqDrift.description: Amount of Frequency Drift in case pbcCmtsFlapListFlapCause is freqDrift (8). Form othe flap causes, this value should be 0.

pbcCmtsFlapListEventsEnable.name: pbcCmtsFlapListEventsEnable
pbcCmtsFlapListEventsEnable.description: Enables or disables the Flap List event generation.
